segments.text: I am looking into a kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a line drawing, quite detailed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems completely fixed on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I see something quite alarming with the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, pouring right over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is even standing in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice this growing mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a strange sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so utterly unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
